zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，短期趋势偏空]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）价格为11.6167美元，24小时内下跌2.38%。从价格走势来看，AVAX在11.5882美元的低点附近形成了一定的支撑，但整体趋势显示出疲软的迹象。若价格继续下探，可能会测试更强的支撑位，如11.500美元。

在技术指标方面，MACD线为负值，表明短期内卖方力量占据主导地位。虽然RSI未提供具体数值，但若其低于30，可能暗示超卖状态，短期内有反弹的可能。短期均线SMA(20)在11.73332美元附近，显示出价格在此水平上方的压力。

支撑位方面，11.5882美元是关键的短期支撑，若突破将可能导致进一步下行。阻力位则在11.733美元附近，需关注是否能有效突破此水平。整体来看，短期内AVAX的走势可能维持震荡整理，建议投资者在支撑位附近谨慎试探多单，若跌破支撑则需及时止损。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 11.6167, reflecting a 2.38% decline over the past 24 hours. The recent trading range has seen a high of 11.904 and a low of 11.5882. This price action indicates a potential bearish trend in the short term, as the price is currently closer to the lower end of this range. A sustained move below 11.5882 could further exacerbate selling pressure, leading traders to closely monitor this level as a potential support.

In terms of technical indicators, although the RSI(14) is not available, the negative MACD value of -0.0048 suggests bearish momentum is present. This indicates that sellers are currently in control, and a crossover of the MACD line below the signal line could confirm a continuation of this trend. The SMA(20) at 11.73332 serves as a dynamic resistance level; if the price fails to reclaim this average, it may reinforce the bearish outlook.

Traders should consider key support levels at 11.5882 and 11.5000, which could provide potential buying opportunities if the price bounces back. Conversely, if these levels are breached, it may open the door for further declines, with 11.2000 acting as the next psychological support. Conversely, a breakout above the SMA(20) and the recent high of 11.904 could signal a shift in momentum, prompting short-term buying strategies.

In conclusion, current market conditions suggest caution for AVAX traders. Monitoring the aforementioned support and resistance levels is crucial, as well as keeping an eye on the MACD for any signs of reversal. A strategic approach would involve waiting for confirmation of a trend change before committing to larger positions, ensuring that risk management practices are in place.
